meanings.sent1: She was always late to class, earning a reputation for being untimeous.
meanings.sent2: The untimeous arrival of the bus caused many students to be late for school.
meanings.sent3: His untimeous habit of forgetting his keys led to many frustrating moments.
meanings.sent4: The untimeous rain during the picnic dampened everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The untimeous train departure left passengers stranded at the station.

meanings.definition: Happening or done at an inappropriate time.
meanings.sent1: Making jokes during the serious meeting was untimeous and disrespectful.
meanings.sent2: Her untimeous laughter during the sad movie disrupted the other viewers.
meanings.sent3: The untimeous arrival of the pizza during the wedding made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His untimeous proposal at the funeral shocked everyone in attendance.
meanings.sent5: The untimeous fireworks display during the daytime seemed out of place.
